nodes.text: Gatalentan tea was a type of tea exported from the planet Gatalenta. It was a personal favorite of New Republic Senator Leia Organa, who kept a supply of it stored on her personal starship, the Mirrorbright. The Corellian smuggler Han Solo, Organa's husband, also liked the tea enough to keep a stash of it aboard the Millennium Falcon, his starship.
The Gatalentan tea first appeared in the 2016 novel Bloodline, written by Claudia Gray.
